```python
from soccer_articles import get_bbc_articles

get_bbc_articles(["https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/XXX"])

> [{'source': 'bbc',
  'url': 'https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/XXX',
  'author': 'John Doe',
  'date': '3 hours ago',
  'headline': 'John Doe wants to join the Newteam',
  'body': 'After a brilliant season...'
}]
```
